name: Rethoric
long_description:
Rethoric is a plug-and-play content team specialized in helping founders publish high-quality content consistently and grow on LinkedIn. 

Most founders know the value of building an audience on LinkedIn, but the process demands consistency, time, creativity, writing skills, and energyâ€”things founders often lack.

Our clients only need to attend a content interview session every other week and we do the rest.
one_liner: LinkedIn content consulting & strategy for founders and execs
